title: Accept notification not going away
body: When the accept notification for when my game is ready pops up and i accept, it keeps glitching out and taking me into the game lobby but not removing the accept pop up. I have 30 min dodge ban from this happening twice now, i literally can't lock in champs or do anything and when lobby expires popup is still there and am forced to restart client. Can someone tell me if there is a fix for this or if its just riots fault.

replies.body:
A client repair should fix it, if it doesn't I'd invest in a clean reinstall through the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

Failing all that, submit a ticket tp player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
